headline: Fortinet price target lowered to $88 from $95 at Truist
summary: Truist lowered the firm’s price target on Fortinet (FTNT) to $88 from $95 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares as part of a broader research note previewing Q4 for Cybersecurity names. Companies in the firm’s coverage should report a strong calendar Q4 and take a conservative posture for guidance, so that model setups could drive a continued beat-and-raise cadence for 2026, the analyst tells investors in a research note.
